quote: The premier Lost River Classic route has something for everyone: gravel, pavement, singletrack, doubletrack logging roads, and private farm tracks we have been granted special permission to use...
There will be a post-ride meal and party at the Mathias Community Center. A meal ticket is included for every category.

Hardy County native and IronMan competitor Austin Williams returned from Texas to compete in the Lost River Classic 60-mile course... Austin's siblings, Amber and Sloan, helped run the family's South Branch Cattle and Meat Company table at the farmer's market.
